channel.title: aligned on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in aligned on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Getting Debian lined up
item.description: 15:11 Friday 12 June 2015 JST I'm using my Debian box now, wirelessly (thanks to you), using a dual monitor setup (thanks to Debian maintainers), and have gotten several things working well, almost including the ability to make changes for work while my other machine is in the shop. You suggested that I can reinstall Debian when I get my next PC, but is there some way to save time reinstalling all the junk on a new Debian install?
